segments.text: Why are you up so early , Mary ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm still suffering from a little jetlag .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At least five channels have morning cartoons on Saturdays .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think watching them is a great way to learn English .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree . And some cartoons are entertaining even for adults .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you kidding ? It's too early for her .
segments.speaker: S1
